ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_ME.INTRO: Hello, I am a German-speaking frontend developer based in Leipzig...
ABOUT_ME.HIGHLIGHT_1: Flexible in terms of work environments...
ABOUT_ME.HIGHLIGHT_2: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges...
ABOUT_ME.HIGHLIGHT_3: In my profession, programming is not just about writing code...

TECHNOLOGIES.TITLE: Technologies
TECHNOLOGIES.INTRO: My journey has taken me through various projects where I have used a wide range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to new technologies and methods to continuously improve my skills and stay up-to-date in the ever-evolving world of web development.
TECHNOLOGIES.CONTACT_ME: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding my knowledge.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.EXPLORE: Explore a selection of my work here – Interact with the projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: A task management tool inspired by Kanban to easily create and organize tasks.

EL_POLLO_LOCO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
EL_POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION: A 2D jump 'n' run game with animations and various enemies.

DA_BUBBLE.TITLE: Da Bubble
DA_BUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: A real-time chat app with Firebase backend and Angular.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: What my colleagues say about me

COMMENTS.USER_1: Dennis is a very dedicated frontend developer and always works on projects with great passion.
COMMENTS.USER_2: He is very helpful and always has a solution ready when problems arise.
COMMENTS.USER_3: With his creative approach and technical knowledge, he enriches every project.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Me
CONTACT.SUBHEADER: Do you have a problem to solve?
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Contact me via this form. I look forward to hearing from you, getting to know your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT.CALL_TO_ACTION: Do you need a frontend developer? Let's talk!

FORM.NAME_TITLE: Only letters and spaces are allowed.
FORM.PRIVACY_POLICY_TWO: and agree to the processing of my data in accordance with it.
FORM.NAME_PATTERN: The name must only contain letters and spaces and consist of two words.
FORM.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address.
FORM.MESSAGE_MINLENGTH: The message must be at least 3 characters long.
FORM.PRIVACY_REQUIRED: You must accept the privacy policy.

RESPONSIBLE_PARTY.TEXT:
The party responsible for processing your personal data on this website is:
Dennis Freyer
Email:

DATA_COLLECTION.HEADER: 2. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
DATA_COLLECTION.TEXT: When you visit this website, technical data (e.g., IP address, browser type, access time) is automatically collected. This data is used for the technical provision and security of the website and is not used to identify the user.

CONTACT.TEXT: If you contact me by email, the data you provide (e.g., name, email address, message) will be stored to process your request. I will not share this data without your consent.

LEGAL_BASIS.TEXT: Your data is processed in accordance with Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR based on my legitimate interest in providing a functional and secure website, as well as Art. 6 (1) (b) GDPR to process your requests.

STORAGE_DURATION.TEXT: Personal data is only stored for as long as necessary for the respective purpose or as required by legal retention periods.

DATA_SHARING.TEXT: I do not share personal data with third parties unless required by law or necessary to fulfill a contract.

LIST: Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
Right to object to processing (Art. 21 GDPR)
YOUR_RIGHTS.TEXT: To exercise your rights, you can contact me at any time.

COOKIES.TEXT: This website does not use cookies or tracking technologies.

DATA_SECURITY.TEXT: I implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data from loss, misuse, or unauthorized access.

CHANGES.TEXT: This privacy policy may be updated to comply with legal requirements or reflect changes to the website.

VAT_ID.TITLE: VAT Identification Number according to § 27 a of the German VAT Act:

CONTENT_LIABILITY.TITLE: Liability for Content:
CONTENT_LIABILITY.TEXT: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to § 7 Abs.1 TMG under general laws. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point in time at which a concrete violation of the law becomes known. Upon becoming aware of such violations, we will remove this content immediately.

LINK_LIABILITY.TITLE: Liability for Links:
LINK_LIABILITY.TEXT: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. However, permanent monitoring of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation of the law. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.

COPYRIGHT.TITLE: Copyright:
COPYRIGHT.TEXT: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The reproduction, editing, distribution, and any kind of use outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this page are only permitted for private, non-commercial use. Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is marked as such. Should you become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.

NOTE.TITLE: Note:
NOTE.TEXT: This imprint serves as a template and should be adapted to your individual needs and legal requirements. It is recommended to consult a lawyer for specific legal questions to ensure that all legal requirements are met.
